notes: JSON files always start with an array[] or an object{}
JSON files cannot have comments, so put any comments in this array
Commas go between items in an array or an object, but there should NEVER be a trailing comma
All property names must be in quotation marks
Use a linter like jsonlint.com to validate JSON
